title: Spotify Clone
description: A modern, responsive Spotify clone built with React, Node.js and Express. This full-stack application replicates core Spotify features including music playback, search functionality, playlist management, and a sleek user interface.

title: Supermarket Demo
description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React and Node.js, featuring a custom API hosted on Render that processes data from DummyJSON. It demonstrates the complete development cycle, from backend routing and external API integration to independent deployment on GitHub Pages.

title: Users CRUD
description: A full-stack user management system featuring a REST API built with Node.js and a modular Vanilla JS frontend. It implements SOLID principles, real-time multi-language support (i18n), and complete CRUD operations.

title: Go Concurrency Booking
description: A high-performance backend service built in Go that manages massive concurrent ticket reservations using Redis distributed locking and PostgreSQL optimistic locking. It follows a Hexagonal Architecture to ensure atomic transactions and prevent race conditions in high-traffic environments.

title: Little Lemon Restaurant
description: The backend API for the Little Lemon Restaurant, built with Django and Django REST Framework. It handles menu management, table bookings, and user authentication. NOTE: AI was used to generate the index containing the API endpoints.
